title: COVID-19 vaccination may prevent postoperative delirium in elderly patients undergoing elective non-cardiac surgery: The PNDRFAP and PNDABLE studies
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Haoran Zhang, Aihua Zhang, Yanan Lin, Chuan Li, Yunchao Yang, Rui Dong, Xu Lin, Bin Wang, Yanlin Bi
